channel.title: Explode on impact ninja smoke bombs?
channel.description: I know this sounds wierd but i really want to know how to make them if anyone knows.

item.title: Explode on impact ninja smoke bombs?
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

Common garden weedkillier is my favourite.
A quick bit of easy anion exchange and you have the same stuff the unabomber used.
its about 1.64 per Kg in wilkos and at about 54.4% purity, and very easy separate.
Mixed with icing sugar (or any other powdered fuel source) it can be ignited by a 9v battery.
Can also be mixed with golden syrup to provide a sticky napalm type weapon.

I miss High school chemisty.

Read full topic
item.source: Explode on impact ninja smoke bombs?

item.title: Explode on impact ninja smoke bombs?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:6, topic:35693”]By far the best smoke bombs I ever managed to get working were the ones every pyro kid makes (Sugar + Potassium Nitrate) caramelised. Good fun, although you will fuck up your mothers frying pan.

Yes, I did get beaten. Hehehe.[/quote]

Pottassium Nitrate is just saltpeter, if your wondering where to buy it.

Read full topic

item.title: Explode on impact ninja smoke bombs?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

jme_009:

Well if I remember correctly, you posted a tut on exploding darts of some sort. Basically what you could do instead of using an explosive material is putting a smoke bomb mixture. The most common and very effective way is SaltPeter(can be found at some grocery stores, and some pharmacy’s. It’s used for preserving meats and stuff, the mythe about it being used in prisons to reduce sexuality is a myth so if you ask your parents and they laugh at you, explain to them that it is just a myth, as this was considered to be true while they were growing up) and sugar melted together. Search google

The darts weren’t explosive, just throwing darts.

EDIT: Never mind. Didn’t have the patience to read the rest of the post

Read full topic
